import React, { Component } from 'react'; import Header from '../components/Header/Header'; import Footer from '../components/Footer/Footer'; import SideBar from '../components/SideBar/SideBar'; import axios from 'axios'; import {storage} from '../firebase/index'; class UpdateProfile extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { id:"", name: "", phone: "", email: "", address: "", avatar: "", description: "", document: "", service_category_id: "" } } componentDidMount() { var retrievedData = localStorage.getItem("User"); var user = JSON.parse(retrievedData); this.state.id = user[0].id; this.state.name = user[0].name; this.state.email = user[0].email; } render() { return (
